```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r load_packages, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r read_data}
extermin <- read_csv("declarations-exterminations-punaises-de-lit.csv")

head(extermin)

extermin %>% 
  mutate(wk = lubridate::isoweek(DATE_DECLARATION),
         yr = lubridate::year(DATE_DECLARATION)) %>% 
  group_by(yr, wk) %>% tally %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = wk, y = n, colour = yr, group = yr)) + 
  # geom_point() + 
  geom_line() + 
  scale_colour_distiller(type = "qual")
```
